replies.msg:

原本佢個on9研究係係做黎俾廢老睇，
俾佢地攞黎攻擊示威者攪亂香港。咁啱之後721爆單咁既野，俾佢地弄假成真。佢呢份報告可以成為我地既文宣武器。如果拿捏得好，可以幫我地吸引到外國人關注，但如果外國人真係信就可能真係會撤走。


The Hong Kong police lost the ability of maintaining the public security in Hong Kong.

A report by China Institute of City Competitiveness has shown that Hong Kong is no longer the safest city in China. The report shows that the public security of Hong Kong is even worse than Shenzhen’s.

There had been a number of large scale mobs in Yuen Long(Hong Kong S.A.R.) on 21 July randomly attacking citizens. While the mobs attacked citizens savagely, three police stations, which located around Yuen Long, were closed because the police were unable to resist the mob attack.

The mob attack lasted entire night on 21 July. Some citizens called the police hotline but the Hong Kong Police Force resist to send any police to help the injured citizens after the Hong Kong Police Force analysed the situation because they believed they are unable to subside the violence of the mobs.

A few days later, a Hong Kong citizen, named Chung Kin Ping, applied a procession in Yuen Long on 27 July but the Hong Kong Police Force rejected his application with the reason that Hong Kong Police are unable to maintain the public security in Yuen Long if there is any conflict between the mobs and the parades.

Hong Kong is no longer one of the safest city around the world. Foreigner should leave Hong Kong as soon as possible for their personal safety and the leader of nations should promulgated travel alert for Hong Kong if the Hong Kong Police Force is still unable to maintain the public security.

利申，al ue f
